plot outline: Khayyum Bhai (Ram Babu) joins people's war gang in his teenage and develops ego clashes with them. To take revenge, he becomes a police informer and starts doing illegal activities by using his cop background. How did the authorities put an end to his empire is the rest of the story.
title: Khayyum Bhai
plot: _Khayyum Bhai_ (qv) (Ram Babu) joins people's war gang in his teenage and develops ego clashes with them. To take revenge, he becomes a police informer and starts doing illegal activities by using his cop background. How did the authorities put an end to his empire is the rest of the story.
